meanings.definition: Arranged in three pairs or sets.
meanings.sent1: The trinugous flowers bloomed in clusters of three.
meanings.sent2: The trinugous flags were displayed in sets of three.
meanings.sent3: The trinugous cupcakes were arranged in groups of three for the party.
meanings.sent4: The trinugous stars in the sky seemed to form patterns of three.
meanings.sent5: The trinugous arrangement of chairs made the room feel organized and balanced.

meanings.sent1: The trinugous plant had leaves with three pairs of leaflets each.
meanings.sent2: The trinugous tree displayed its trios of leaflets in the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The trinugous plant looked like it was waving with its leaflets in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: The trinugous leaves on the branches created a symmetrical pattern.
meanings.sent5: The trinugous foliage made the garden look lush and vibrant.
